channel.title: [HELP] Useitem [PI] [HELP]
channel.description:
Fed up now of over 100 of my players using Dragon bones on alter and miss clicking it on a person and then making them disconnect.
Is there a way so they don't Disconnect if they useitem on player
Thanks
BASE - PI
